title: Legendary Battles Vol. 1 Cinematic PRO
description: A collection of powerful, cinematic orchestral tracks suited for action sequences.
longDescription:
Click here to listen to the album preview


A collection of action-focused tracks filled with big drums, orchestral sections, choirs, percussive rhythms and heart-pumping, energizing themes. The themes vary from sci-fi all the way to fantasy undertones, and they all preserve a pulsating perspective. The tracks have key edit points for trailer usage as well for added versatility.


Track count/title:


  1. Ethereal Entities
  2. Ethereal Entities (Action Arrangement)
  3. The Reborn
  4. Sky Warlords
  5. Titan Wrath
  6. Titan Wrath (No Choir)


Since the nature of the material is focused on themes/melodies, this is excellent for cutscene content, menu music, credit rolls, and to some extent in-game background music.


Award-winning composer for video games and films, Lex is a game lover to the core, and his wish is to fuse them with his love for music, therefore if you desire to collaborate or have any inquiries/custom requests, don't hesitate to contact at lexdumitru@gmail.com, or browse his Unreal profile for more awesome music.


A toast to creativity!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  AAA quality, professionally mixed and mastered, action-focused orchestral tracks
  •  Key break-points for easy editing
  •  A wider spectrum of themes

Number of Audio Wavs: 6

Number of Audio Cues: 6

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 15

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All
